  • Package graphanalyzer.controller.routines

    • Class graphanalyzer.controller.routines.StronglyConnectedComponentsRoutine extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -460816047146222742L

      • Serialized Fields

        • alg

          StronglyConnectedComponentsAlgorithm alg
          Instance of the actual algorithm.
          See Also:
          StronglyConnectedComponentsAlgorithm

        • colorsForScc

          java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> colorsForScc
          List of random colors for strongly connected components to display in graph

        • firstDfsCounter

          int firstDfsCounter
          Counts the current position of the first DFS

        • firstDfsHistory

          java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> firstDfsHistory
          Protocol list of the first depth first search of the algorithm

        • graph

          DirectedGraph graph
          Graph the algorithm should be used with.

        • mapVertexToVisitCount

          java.util.HashMap<Vertex,java.lang.Integer> mapVertexToVisitCount
          Maps vertices to the amount of "visits" throughout the first depth first

        • sccInnerCounter

          int sccInnerCounter
          Counts the current position of the outer list of the StronglyConnectedComponentsRoutine.stronglyConnectedComponents

        • sccOuterCounter

          int sccOuterCounter
          Counts the current position of the outer list of the StronglyConnectedComponentsRoutine.stronglyConnectedComponents

        • secondaryPanelContent

          java.lang.StringBuilder secondaryPanelContent
          Builder for the content that should be displayed in the secondary panel of GraphPanel

        • state

          StronglyConnectedComponentsRoutine.STATE state
          Current state of the routine.
          See Also:
          StronglyConnectedComponentsRoutine.STATE

        • stronglyConnectedComponents

          java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<Vertex>> stronglyConnectedComponents
          List of strongly connected components of given StronglyConnectedComponentsRoutine.graph

    • Class graphanalyzer.model.algorithms.StronglyConnectedComponentsAlgorithm extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      3049007391864642836L

      • Serialized Fields

        • discoveryTimes

          java.util.Map<Vertex,java.lang.Integer> discoveryTimes
          A map that contains every vertex of the graph and its specific discovery time

        • finishedVertices

          java.util.Stack<Vertex> finishedVertices
          Stack of the finished vertices of the first depth first search

        • finishingTimes

          java.util.Map<Vertex,java.lang.Integer> finishingTimes
          A map that contains every vertex of the graph and its specific finishing time

        • firstDFS

          java.util.LinkedList<Vertex> firstDFS
          A list of the vertices visited in the first depth first search

        • firstDfsProtocol

          java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> firstDfsProtocol
          A list that contains the complete DFS path of the first DFS

        • graph

          DirectedGraph graph
          The graph the algorithm should use to compute its strongly connected components

        • secondDFS

          java.util.LinkedList<Vertex> secondDFS
          A list of the vertices visited in the second depth first search

        • stronglyConnectedComponents

          java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<Vertex>> stronglyConnectedComponents
          The computed strongly connected components. Every list inside the list expresses a scc

        • time

          int time
          A counter variable that is used to determine the timestamps for StronglyConnectedComponentsAlgorithm.discoveryTimes and StronglyConnectedComponentsAlgorithm.finishingTimes

        • transposedGraph

          DirectedGraph transposedGraph
          The transpose of the given StronglyConnectedComponentsAlgorithm.graph

        • visitedVertices

          java.util.Set<Vertex> visitedVertices
          A list used to store vertices that have been visited
